Title: Beaded A-line Evening with Train

----

Sku: CR701

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 12, 14, 6, 8, 10, 4

----

Colors: black

----

Category: evening, formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: CR701-black-beaded-a-line-evening-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: Stunning A-line with beaded applique that cascades from the neckline to the waistline. The sides have peek-a-boo cutouts that are lined with a sheer fabric and trimmed with the same bead work. The back of the gown is sheer with beading on the lower back and the floor length gown sweeps into a court train.
